titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to change the rate of duty for certain bicycles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty on certain lightweight bicycles.
